name: i had that dream about the machines again
name_original: i had that dream about the machines again
description:
i had that dream about the machines again

A short, Twine-y text game about that one friend group where everyone hates each other, relating everything to the last thing you learned, and maj9 chords. Made for 6AMES MADE QUICK???

Control with a mouse. One ending.

Full attribution and license information for the assets I didn't make (of which there are a lot!), as well as the (garbage) source code, can be found at Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/CHz16/i-had-that-dream-about-the-machines-again/
